scripts.test:visual:staging:checkout: npx testcafe chrome:headless Test_VS_Checkout.js -s visual-screenshots/Staging_ScreenCompareCheckout --take-snapshot actual --skip-js-errors --reporter html:reports/staging/$ID/visual/checkout.html && npx testcafe-blink-diff visual-screenshots/Staging_ScreenCompareCheckout --compare base:actual --open --threshold 0.03 --skip-js-errors; mv generated/index.html reports/staging/$ID/visual/checkout.comparison.html; mv generated/* reports/staging/$ID/visual/
